Class HorizontalComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.ComponentProxy
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.HorizontalComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IHorizontalComponent

    public class HorizontalComponent
extends ComponentProxy
implements IHorizontalComponent
    Class wrapping a generic component into a horizontal component.
